movies.title: Avatar:The Last Airbender
movies.description: Aang, a 12-year-old boy, must put his childhood aside to impede chaos that the Fire Nation is creating. He embarks on a quest to restore harmony in the nations of Water, Earth and Air.
reviews: Wow this is one of the best movies ever produced!
It was an objectively terrible movie, horribly acted, boring, implausible.
It's bright and colourful and funny, with an involving storyline and a devoted fanbase that carried it over to a whole sequel series.
There's some fighting and violence, but it's not bloody or even particularly scary. Love it!

movies.title: Men in Black
movies.description: A brash New York City cop partners with a no-nonsense government agent on a top-secret team that monitors extraterrestrials on Earth.
reviews: I don't know, man. Is this a movie or comedy?
Definitely worth the time and dime. Can't wait to watch what they have lined up for us.
Perfect in a light-hearted way. Whoever made this movie is a genius.
Will Smith was in his element here. Just be careful he don't slap you from the screen. hahaha...

movies.title: Game Of Thrones
movies.description: Nine noble families wage war against each other in order to gain control over the mythical land of Westeros. Meanwhile, a force is rising after millenniums and threatens the existence of living men.
reviews: This easily goes down in history as the best TV show ever made.
Can't argue with the numbers. GOT is the GOAT. The A moves in silence.
This is a 10. Nobody doesn't like GOT. This show takes the throne in the battle of TV show thrones.
I love me some actions and mythics. Got 'em all here. What else could someone ever want in life?

movies.title: Better Call Saul
movies.description: Ex-con artist Jimmy McGill turns into a small-time attorney and goes through a series of trials and tragedies, as he transforms into his alter ego Saul Goodman, a morally challenged criminal lawyer.
reviews: How am I just learning of this show? How? Where have you been all my life?
This is the it. It. It. It. How many ITs do you want?
It's a'ight. Don't know what all the hype is about though! Smh...
If only this was real life.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.description: Walter White, a chemistry teacher, discovers that he has cancer and decides to get into the meth-making business to repay his medical debts. His priorities begin to change when he partners with Jesse.
reviews: Just as bad as the name. Wouldn't recommend it. Such a waste of time!
I don't care what you bring me, red, blue, white...This is the shit!
Just an overrated movie. If I could turn back time, I could go back and steal the production money so that it wouldn't exist!
There's some fighting and violence, but it's not bloody or even particularly scary. Love it!

movies.title: Assassin's Creed
movies.description: With the help of technology, Callum learns that he is a descendant of a dangerous society. He travels back in time to learn about his ancestors and acquire skills to defeat an evil organisation.
reviews: You can't hate on this movie.
Not far from the video game. I love it.
I wanna watch it. I wanna live it. I wanna love it so bad that it hurts.
I've watched this over and over again.

movies.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
movies.description: Adventures abound as a group of teenagers infiltrates an elite racing league controlled by a nefarious organization that is bent on world domination.
reviews: I think its funny and exciting i love tyler posey being the main voice over.
It gives me a nostalgic memory of tw where tyler is the serious person and his friend stiles is sarcastically funny.
i would say its one of the best animated tv shows ever made
Easily my top two favourites.

movies.title: Luca
movies.description: Set in a beautiful seaside town on the Italian Riviera, the original animated feature is a coming-of-age story about one young boy experiencing an unforgettable summer filled with gelato, pasta and endless scooter rides. Luca shares these adventures with his newfound best friend, but all the fun is threatened by a deeply held secret: he is a sea monster from another world just below the water's surface.

movies.title: Prison Break
movies.description: Crime and Investigative category. An engineer installs himself in a prison he helped design, in order to save his falsely accused brother from a death sentence.
movies.reviews: This is the best crime movie of all time
